Test Name: Purkinje Cell Cytoplasmic Antibody Type 1 (PCA-1) Titer, Spinal Fluid
Purpose: To detect and quantify PCA-1 autoantibodies in spinal fluid for the evaluation of paraneoplastic neurological syndromes.
Equipment: Indirect immunofluorescence (IIF) slides specific for PCA-1, fluorescent microscope, control samples, pipettes, humid chamber
